data: Eliph' Hewlitt, book agent, seated in his weather-beaten top buggy, drove his horse, Irontail, carefully along the rough Iowa hill road that leads from Jefferson to Clarence.
Kilo : being the love story of Eliph' Hewlitt, book agent
